channel.title: Cant find the default the ip help plz
channel.description: i have downloaded multiplpe 317 servers and tryed to find the default ip on the clients but i cannot find the deafault ip 127.0.0.1 if anyone could help that would be nice

return null;
}

item.title: Cant find the default the ip help plz
item.dc:creator: @ilegalpvp ilegalpvp
item.description:
@ilegalpvp wrote:

either in gui.java like he said or client.java, it might be “0.0.0.0” or “*.no-ip.” (just search for no-ip by pressing Ctrl+F in gui or client), hope this helped.
